salaryExpectations: LKR 50,000 to LKR 150,000+ per month, heavily based on commissions and tips.
futureOutlook: The beauty and wellness industry is constantly growing in Sri Lanka. There is high demand for skilled hairstylists and beauticians in modern salons. The key to a high income is building a large, loyal client base. Many successful beauticians eventually open their own salons, which can be very profitable.
